Reviews.Title: A Lot in a Small Package
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Hawthorne
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I thought it would be perfect for my website and blog use.  So far, it has lived up to its expectations.  It is not a hefty camera, but do not ber deceived by a lack of weight.  I do a lot of interior available light shooting so I use the low light feature in the SCN mode.  It produces excellent photos at varying high ISO settings - which it selects automatically.  I have used the other modes and am equally pleased with them.  The image stabilization is excellent but you must remember to turn it off if you are using a tripod or you may get some strange results.  The video mode was more than satisfactory in 720 HD.  Is it as good as a digital SLR?  No.  But for the size, cost, and what it is capable of, it will be a camera that will get many uses in the years to come

Reviews.Title: Great value And pics
Reviews.Author: Jbw563
Reviews.Content: Only complaint would be it is a little slow to reload after taking each picture. Takes great pictures. Zoom is awesome. The package deal we bought was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Husband likes it.
Reviews.Author: Julia I
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted this camera for a trip to Alaska.  We are below average camera users and he is finding this very easy to use and loves the zoom.  Haven't tried the video yet.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera
Reviews.Author: S. Z. Paolella "Hmsclmom"
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT camera. I love the lens, the powerful flash. I wish it has a "sport setting" instead of having to play around with the manual controls.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Virginia L. Orso
Reviews.Content: Haven't owned it that long, but so far I love it.  The description was incomplete and did not list battery charger and I purchased the accessory kit for nothing but the camera is working fine so far.

Reviews.Title: I have found this to be an easy to use, light-weight camera that takes good quality photos
Reviews.Author: Carol Gruber "Nana"
Reviews.Content: The camera has a nice zoom capacity and can be manually adjusted when needed. It is not a bulky camera. The neck strap makes it easy to take along most anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed!  Not recommended.
Reviews.Author: Deborah Miller
Reviews.Content: My daughter liked the look of this camera and had to have it.  Reviews made it seem like a good camera.  I just bought an Olympus Pen e-pl2 for not much more than this camera.  There is no comparison in my opinion.  I do not recommend the camera.  The quality of photos is just average, which doesn't cut it for me with a $250 price tag.  If this was a $100 camera, I would say it is not a bad camera but I still wouldn't want it.

Reviews.Title: For a good picture and fun
Reviews.Author: mighty_useful
Reviews.Content: I lost my father's camera, so this was the replacement. Overall it gives good pictures - because they are so colourful and zoom very powerfulBut quality is not very good if you look up close, also very slow in between photos, it's missing the 'sports mode'.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: tiffany
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this product.  It is a great little camera, easy to use, easy to carry and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: 30x zoom isn't clear and jumps around so much you can't get an in focus photo.
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: 30x zoom isn't clear and jumps around so much you can't get an in focus photo. Camera is fine except for the zoom. Would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I like this camera, but....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "feline lover"
Reviews.Content: it takes lousy pictures in low light conditions.  I wish I had noticed the small hole where the flash comes out of.  Any camera that has that small of an opening to take flash pictures, can not take decent, good or great pictures in low light conditions.  Everything else about this camera, I like.  But taking low light pictures is very important to me and this camera just does not make the grade for this.

Reviews.Title: Canon what else is there
Reviews.Author: Chad roper
Reviews.Content: I've bought several cameras over the years and none compare to a canon this particular model was slightly smaller than I was expecting but never the less it is awesome and I would say if your looking this is the one

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: histo1000
Reviews.Content: a really nice camera for the price. I love it. took it on vacation and the pictures came out great! also easy to handle and use.

Reviews.Title: Gift for friend
Reviews.Author: BitTwiddler "OldSchoolGeek"
Reviews.Content: Gift for friend, she had an older Kodak Easyshare that bit it. Being a casual photographer and having issues with hand shake (she used my Olympus and it was apparent) ease of use, lightness, and image stabilization were very important features. This all-in-one package including the memory card (16gb) and carry case, was a very good deal for the price.She has received it and used it a few times to get used to it. The layout is different than the Easyshare, more like my Olympus, but she is reporting it easy to get used to. The image stabilization is excellent from the test pictures she's sent; for the light duty casual and infrequent photographer, I think this was a good choice for the money. The optical zoom is very good, and returning good pictures.As an adult beginner and light duty camera; for capturing life events; this seems to be a very good choice. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Haven't developed pics yet
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: I love this camera so far! So happy I can do short video with it. And wow! Comes with all the extra accessories! If I knew pics developed as good as good as they look on screen I would give this camera 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: A prize premiere Bundle!  Canon Powershot SX500
Reviews.Author: unique62
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy about the camera equipment that I purchased from Amazon.  I really have no complaints about any of the items I received except one small item.  The camera came with a carrying CASE that I consider quite inadequate.  I think if you are going to give a bag to your customers... at least make it something that would be appreciated.  As I said before, I have no quarrels about any of the items I purchased. Please check the carrying bag before you send one to your customers. My case came to me with a defect.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: fabiola arias baez
Reviews.Content: so far, all I've bought cameras have gone pretty good, and as I love. but this has been one of the best I've purchased

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Susanne F Buttrey
Reviews.Content: I would love to take photography classes, learn to take really cool pictures, and own a professional camera.  That isn't going to happen.  However this camera is super for my needs.  I was trying to get pictures of baby hawks that were in a nest (pretty high up) in a tree.  My camera just wouldn't focus well at that distance.  My daughter brought her Canon PowerShot SX500 IS over for me to use.  I got fabulous pictures of the babies in the nest and the parental unit always perched nearby.  I bought my own that same night!  This is a wonderful camera for zooming in at reasonable distances.  It's easy to use.  I loved that it came with so many accessories!  I priced it at BestBuy before buying it from Amazon.  That day it was on sale - with absolutely no accessories - for the same price as I got it from Amazon.  It also came with everything I needed/wanted - a charger, extra battery, memory card, and even the cutest little table tripod.  The only thing anyone would want in addition to this would be a large tripod and I already owned one.  I would highly recommend this camera/package to anyone!  It's a great camera and great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: michelle johansen
Reviews.Content: I was looking between this camera and another camera, this camera is great. The pictures come out so clear and it can zoom to make things look so close. I also like that it comes with so many extra things, like a battery, a bag, and cleaning kit. I think that this camera is  great for the price.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My husband loves his new camera.its his" first real" and he can't put it down. Get quality, the flash really works and the videos audio is clear. We would definitely recommend the bundle. Didn't give it a five because it is sort of tiny for " man hands" lol

Reviews.Title: Fantastic photographs!
Reviews.Author: Jess Lobbezoo
Reviews.Content: I will admit I am not a professional photographer by any means,but with my new Canon SX500 my photos look like a professional took them.  Very easy to use, awesome zoom quality, and not very large.  I am actually shocked how great my photos look. The crispness of the photos is so true to life you can see the dew on a blade of grass that it's over 20 feet away.  So far, all the pictures I have taken have turned out fabulous and that's using auto focus.  I love it! And I don't have to carry around a huge camera bag with different lens to capture the perfect shot whether it is 1 ft away or 100 feet (landscape) away.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Gary Collins
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a two week Amtrak vacation & spent time in California, Seattle & the Grand Canyon. The camera performed well in all conditions.  Low light, bright light, action and still were all very good.  Several were shot from the train while moving.GWC

Reviews.Title: Great camera package at a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Connie J. Randel
Reviews.Content: I have now used the camera several times and feel like I have learned most of what I need to know.  I have gotten some shots that I have never been able to accomplish on previous similarly equipped cameras.  I am delighted with the smaller size due to a past neck surgery.  It is light enough that it does not pull and hurt when wearing around neck for extended periods.I have taken pictures in low light, indoors, outdoors, sunsets, extended digital zoom and have not had issues.  The only thing that I have to say that may be negative (and it is very minor) is that I have shot a few shots when I was meaning to focus in.  The shutter is a bit quicker than I am used to using.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: hhh
Reviews.Content: thank u for fast shipping thank so much i will try camera soonCanon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 30x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black) Premiere Bundle With 16GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case

Reviews.Title: canon powershot sx500 is review
Reviews.Author: Janice Largent
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera and love all the extras that come with it!!  Works great. Has a large enough zoom to accommodate everything that i do.

Reviews.Title: Not the camera I expected
Reviews.Author: Deborah Christianson "Debbie C"
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews, I was excited to order the camera.  However, I'm very disappointed in the quality of my pictures.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 30x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black) Premiere Bundle With 16GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case
